problems.title: Quick Sort - Sort an Array
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given an array of N integers.
Sort the array using Quick Sort algorithm (Divide and Conquer approach).
Print the sorted array.

Quick Sort picks a pivot element, partitions array around it, then recursively sorts partitions.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
10 7 8 9 1

Sample Output
1 7 8 9 10

Explanation:
Array is sorted in ascending order using quick sort.

if __name__ == '__main__':
    import sys
    data = sys.stdin.read().strip().split()
    N = int(data[0])
    arr = list(map(int, data[1:]))
    sol = Solution()
    sol.quickSort(arr, 0, N-1)
    print(*arr)

hintsList: Choose last element as pivot. Move all smaller elements to left, larger to right.
After partition, pivot is at correct position. Recursively sort left and right parts.
